name: Passwordstrength
tagline: jQuery plugin to measure the strength of a password.
body:
## ABOUT
PasswordStrength is a jQuery plugin that can be used to measure the strength of. Well. A password.

This is still in development and is not intended for production environments yet.

## To-Do List
* Set password strength to a variable.
* Customize the border color.
* Option to disable form submission based on password strength.
 
## Changelog
v0.0.1 [01/10/2014]
 - Initial Commit
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
